chunk:
Skin Scripts Light Aloe Moisturizer

Brand: Skin

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Aqua (Water), Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel) Water, Glycerin, PEG/PPG-18/18 Dimethicone, Polysorbate 20, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Lonicera Japonica (Honeysuckle) Flower Extract, Carbomer, Citric Acid, Lonicera Caprifolium (Honeysuckle) Flower Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate (L), Potassium Sorbate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice

Juice, Lonicera Japonica (Honeysuckle) Flower Extract, Carbomer, Citric Acid, Lonicera Caprifolium (Honeysuckle) Flower Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate (L), Potassium Sorbate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder, Saccharide Isomerate, Totarol, Acetyl Tributyl Citrate, Phytic Acid, Phenyl t-Butylnitrone (Spin Trap)
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
